channel.title: Nginx on Less is more
channel.description: Recent content in Nginx on Less is more

item.title: PHP FPM
item.description: PHP Install apt-get install php5-fpm php5-mongo php5-mysql /etc/php5/fpm/php.ini ; This directive determines whether or not PHP will recognize code between ; <? and ?> tags as PHP source which should be processed as such. It is ; generally recommended that <?php and ?> should be used and that this feature ; should be disabled, as enabling it may result in issues when generating XML ; documents, however this remains supported for backward compatibility reasons.
